about.description: I am passionate about programming, I developed as an autodidact after my Baccalaureate. I evolved in different company in order to have more experience. I aspire to have a well-written code and have a good code structure. Always give the best of myself.

experiences.description:
- Project study and highlighting of different branch lines.
- Development of reusable module in Laravel and JavaScript, 
as needed.
- Projects management
- Team management.

- Developed dynamic and interactive website that ensured high 
traffic, page views, and User Experience, resulting in 40% 
increase in sales revenue
- Worked alongside another developer to implement RESTful 
API's in PHP (Yii 2) and Node Js
- Build internal tools using PHP to make the code efficient on 
the frontend side

- Continuously suggest improvements for the development 
organization
- Full ownership of website – development, maintenance, and 
trouble shooting
- Designed and developed user-friendly website, including 
optimized check-out page that increased user clicks, and 
subsequently customer purchases by 20%

educations.description: desktop application development with python and the use of Electron Js with JavaScript
mobile app development with Android studio and early React Native
application development with programming languages like PHP, some framework like Laravel and Symfony 2, Javascript and React Js for Frontend
Scientific reflection and a thorough reflection. Better analytical skills

service.title: WebSite
service.content: Construction of your professional website according to your needs.

service.title: Web App
service.content: Construction of your web applications such as e-commerce sites and others.

service.title: Mobile App
service.content: Construction of your mobile applications tailored to the web or independently.

service.title: Desktop App
service.content: Construction of your desktop windows, Linux applications according to your needs.

service.title: App managment
service.content: Management from creation to deployment of your applications from A to Z.

service.title: Coching
service.content: Coaching and sponsorship of Junior developers to show them good practices.
